topics.title: Problem Definition: Cardano's Information Overload
topics.summary: Gvuldis explains how Cardano became overwhelming to track with rapid development, predicting Ergo will face similar issues. The team wants to solve this problem proactively before Ergo grows exponentially.

topics.title: Crypto Complexity Barriers for New Users
topics.summary: Most crypto investors never withdraw from centralized exchanges due to complexity. There's no clear guide for navigating ecosystems, leaving newcomers scared to make mistakes with their money.

topics.title: On-Ergo Solution Overview and Features
topics.summary: On-Ergo provides an event calendar, educational platform, Discord bot, and incentives for ecosystem discovery. The solution targets both new and experienced users with gamified onboarding.

topics.title: Event Calendar Development and Permissions
topics.summary: The event calendar centralizes community meetups, dApp launches, and updates in one location. Projects and community members can add events with decentralized permission systems using Discord integration or NFTs.

topics.title: Educational Quest Platform and Gamification
topics.summary: The educational platform features quest roadmaps with rewards for completing learning tasks like creating wallets or first transactions. The goal is guiding users from newbie to Sigmanauts through gamified learning.

topics.title: Discord Bot Integration and AI Automation
topics.summary: The Discord bot serves as community assistant with slash commands for events and adding calendar entries. Future plans include AI-powered announcement parsing and automatic event addition from ecosystem Discord servers.

topics.title: Community Incentives and Engagement Systems
topics.summary: On-Ergo includes leaderboards, raffles, and rewards for quest completion, event attendance, and ecosystem participation. These incentives aim to build healthy community competition and active engagement.

topics.title: Platform Innovation and User Experience
topics.summary: On-Ergo combines event management, gamified onboarding, and DeFi accessibility into one ecosystem hub. The platform provides hands-on ecosystem experience rather than just information.

topics.title: Community-Driven Development and Growth
topics.summary: The platform is designed to evolve with community input and feedback. On-Ergo will facilitate community-led event organization and serve as a central hub for the entire Ergo ecosystem.

topics.title: Target Beneficiaries and Use Cases
topics.summary: On-Ergo benefits newcomers with guided learning, community members with centralized updates, and projects with visibility tools. The platform strengthens the entire Ergo ecosystem through increased accessibility.

topics.title: Development Roadmap and Open Source Plans
topics.summary: Development starts with event calendar and Discord bot, then expands to educational quests and enhanced incentives. The project will be open-sourced for community contributions with flexible roadmap adaptation.
